fullText: Daniel Radcliffe may not be the smoothest song-and-dance man on Broadway, but he's certainly one of the most charming. The 'Harry Potter' star makes a winning J. Pierrepont Finch in the revival of 'How to Succeed in Business Without Really Trying.'
